cells.data:
My name is Zhengbin, I am grad student in Santa Clara university,my major is computer science and engineering. I am currently looking for software engineering jobs and will graduate in March 2016.if the internship position can accept grad student after graduate, it’s also ok for me. 

I’ve gained extensive experience in all aspects of software engineering, Before beginning my studies at Santa University, I interned as a software engineer with NEC software in Beijing, China. During that period, I implemented several technologies such as Spring, Struts. Through classes and my own projects, I have also gained experience in: Java, data structure and algorithms, JavaScript, Html5. CSS3,now I am focusing on the web development (MEAN stack ). 

What’s more, one of my major strengths is that I work very hard and continually look for ways to provide the highest quality  to complete the work.  I am self-motivated and enjoy working in a team environment and also set up high goals and I've been told that I'm persistent. I’m looking for an opportunity to work for a growing company where I can contribute my hands-on experience and grow my career with the company. 

My resume is attached. If you have any open positions that you believe are a good match for me, please feel free to contact me. Thank you very much!

Hi Mike,
My name is Zhengbin, I am grad student in Santa Clara university，my major is computer science and engineering. I am currently looking for software engineering jobs and will graduate in March 2016. 

Through classes and my own projects, I have also gained experience in: Java, data structure and algorithms, JavaScript, Html5. CSS3,now I am focusing on the web development (MEAN stack ). 

 I’m looking for an opportunity to work for a growing company where I can contribute my hands-on experience and grow my career with the company. 

 If you have any open positions that you believe are a good match for me, please feel free to contact me. Thank you very much!

Best Gards,
Zhengbin Luo
robinluo2015@gmail.com
408-334-0017

Hi Jesse,
My name is Zhengbin, I am grad student in Santa Clara university，my major is computer science and engineering. I am currently looking for software engineering jobs and will graduate in March 2016. 

Through classes and my own projects, I have also gained experience in: Java, data structure and algorithms, JavaScript, Html5. CSS3,now I am focusing on the web development. 

 I’m looking for an opportunity to work for yahoo where I can contribute my hands-on experience and grow my career with such great company. 

 If you have any open positions that you believe are a good match for me, please feel free to contact me. Thank you very much!

Best Gards,
